trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection> uses the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection> to programmatically access and modify the `databases` element of the `sqlCacheDependency` in the `cache` configuration section.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection> class by using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection.Databases%2A> property.
Adds a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object to the collection.
Each <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase> in the collection must have a unique name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object to add to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object already exists in the collection or the collection is read only.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> keys.
The string array containing the collection keys.
Removes all the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> objects from the collection.
This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to remove all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file.
Returns the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> element at the specified index.
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned if no element exists at the specified index.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> element to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> element at the specified index.
Returns the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> element with the specified name.
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned if no element exists with the specified name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> element to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> element with the specified name.
Returns the key for the element located at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref>.
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned if no element exists at the specified index.
The index of the key to return.
The key at the specified index.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object at the specified index.
The collection index of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object with the specified name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object with the specified name.
Removes the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> object with the specified name from the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection"></xref> object at the specified index from the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
Resets a specified <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> object that exists within the collection.
The `Set` method modifies an existing <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabaseCollection> element.
A <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException> is thrown if the element already exists or is read-only.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> element to reset.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfileCollection"></xref> is read-only or already exists.
